description.title: Game Description
description.contentTitle1: How to Play Rhythm Diamonds & Gameplay
description.content2: Rhythm Diamonds is played in a split-screen format. On the top, there’s the paytable.There’s the paytable with the five Diamond spaces following it. On the bottom , you have the bet amount setter.
description.content4: You can roll seven outcomes on the five spots using the Diamond colours. All seven come with different payouts:
description.zeroMatchDescription: None of the Diamonds are matching
description.pairDescription: Two Diamonds match, the rest are odd
description.twoPairsDescription: Two Diamonds of one color and two Diamonds of another color match, the fifth one is an odd
description.threeOfAKindDescription: Three Diamonds match, the rest are odd
description.fullHouseDescription: Three Diamonds of one color and two Diamonds of another

fairVerification.title: Verification Example
fairVerification.description1: 在一輪遊戲結束並顯示隨機值之後，可以使用以下的 python 程式碼來重現結果。

bet.invalidFormat: Can’t bet more than your balance！
